hero.headline: Residential Excavation
hero.subheadline: Foundation & Site Work for Your Home Projects

sections.title: Trusted Residential Excavation Contractor
sections.content:
From foundation excavation to utility trenching, BEAR GRADE handles all your residential excavation needs with precision and care. We work on projects of all sizes, from small additions to complete home site preparation.

Our experienced operators use modern equipment to excavate efficiently while protecting your property. We understand the importance of accuracy in excavation work and deliver results that set the stage for successful projects.

sections.title: Residential Excavation Services
sections.content:
We provide excavation services for:

- **Foundation Excavation**: Precise digging for basements and foundations
- **Site Preparation**: Clearing and grading for new construction
- **Utility Trenching**: Water, sewer, and electrical line installation
- **Septic System Installation**: Complete excavation for septic tanks and drain fields
- **Drainage Solutions**: French drains and drainage systems
- **Pool Excavation**: Dig outs for in-ground pools

Licensed and insured with 9 years of experience. Contact us for your free estimate!
